channel.title: Missing ladder in bm_c1a1c
channel.description:
Hi,
first of all let me congratulate you guys on creating/finishing this mod. Ive been looking forward to playing this since I read about it in a magazine in 2006, Ive been constantly checking your website every few months, and watched the trailers dozens of times. I even applied for the voice actorsback then. But enough of that...To my problem: It seems a ladder is gone in my game.
[url]https://cdn03.trixum.de/upload2/F/Q/FQx6hHIB39jZ135230600078P1546.jpg[/url] [url]https://cdn01.trixum.de/upload2/p/x/pxbTwXY5jh3o135230600273P1546.jpg[/url]
Here is the data you need:
hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c1a1c at: -3216 x, -2416 y, -1355 z
setpos -3216.000732 -2416.000732 -1355.968750;setang -57.836437 -34.675030 0.000000
I hope you can help me get back in the game :slight_smile:
Squizel

item.title: Missing ladder in bm_c1a1c
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Locking the thread as requested by OP. Note to OP, try not to triple post in future. You can always edit a post to add new information.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing ladder in bm_c1a1c
item.dc:creator: Squizel
item.description:
oh wait a sec, I think I know what you mean! Sry to bother you with this, clumsy me.

close pls

Read full topic

item.title: Missing ladder in bm_c1a1c
item.dc:creator: Squizel
item.description:
btw, in case its not clear to see on the screenshots: I did of course use the valve to make the water rise.

I had a look at the walkthrough on https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Unforeseen_Consequences as well, and did what he did there.

still, no ladder

Read full topic

item.title: Missing ladder in bm_c1a1c
item.dc:creator: Squizel
item.description:
Thanks for the answer, I will have a closer look again.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing ladder in bm_c1a1c
item.dc:creator: Cpl.1nsane
item.description:
It’s missing on purpose, explore a little.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing ladder in bm_c1a1c
item.dc:creator: hif
item.description:
Hello,
this is not a missing object or something.
The scene that you have shown is correct.
If you are there jump down (like in your screens)
you need to find a valve and open it!
Water will increase, and you can swim back to the main area

Read full topic

item.title: Missing ladder in bm_c1a1c
item.dc:creator: Squizel
item.description:
Hi,

first of all let me congratulate you guys on creating/finishing this mod. Ive been looking forward to playing this since I read about it in a magazine in 2006, Ive been constantly checking your website every few months, and watched the trailers dozens of times. I even applied for the voice actorsback then. But enough of that…To my problem: It seems a ladder is gone in my game.

https://cdn03.trixum.de/upload2/F/Q/FQx6hHIB39jZ135230600078P1546.jpg
https://cdn01.trixum.de/upload2/p/x/pxbTwXY5jh3o135230600273P1546.jpg

Here is the data you need:

hostname: Half-Life 2
version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure
map : bm_c1a1c at: -3216 x, -2416 y, -1355 z

setpos -3216.000732 -2416.000732 -1355.968750;setang -57.836437 -34.675030 0.000000

I hope you can help me get back in the game

Squizel

Read full topic
